response.overview: L'Arc-en-Ciel brings their complete 18 live works as Blu-ray format! This item features "heavenly - films."  This live Blu-ray series contains the following 18 titles: "heavenly - films," "Light my fire!," "1999 Grand Cross Conclusion," "Club Circuit 2000 Realive -No Cut-," "7," "LIVE IN USA - at 1st Mariner Arena July 3, 2004," "Smile Tour 2004," "Awake Tour 2005," "Asialive 2005," "15th L'Anniversary Live," "Are you ready? 2007 Mata Heart ni Hi wo Tsuketo! in OKINAWA," "Tour 2007-2008 Theater of Kiss," "Documentary Films - Trans Asia Via Paris -," "Live in Paris," "Tour 2008 L'7 -Trans Asia Via Paris-," "20th L'Anniversary LIVE -Day1-," "20th L'Anniversary LIVE -Day2-," and "World Tour 2012 Live At Madison Square Garden."
response.title: L'Arc-en-Ciel - heavenly - films
